sentences.en: A comfortable working environment will increase productivity.
sentences.cn: 舒适的工作环境能提高生产效率.

sentences.en: Farmers are introducing in novations which increase the productivity.
sentences.cn: 农民们正引进提高生产力的新方法.

sentences.en: Farmers are introducing innovations which increase the productivity.
sentences.cn: 农民们正引进提高生产力的新方法。

sentences.en: His method of obtaining a high level of productivity is demanding.
sentences.cn: 他那种提高生产率的方法实施起来非常困难。

sentences.en: It cost the country $4 million in lost productivity .
sentences.cn: 它对该国造成了400万美元的生产力损失。

sentences.en: One of the payoffs was an increase in productivity.
sentences.cn: 结果之一是生产率的提高.

sentences.en: Our energies must be directed towards higher productivity.
sentences.cn: 我们必须努力谋求增产.

sentences.en: The average yearly increment in labour productivity in industry was 4.5 per cent.
sentences.cn: 工业劳动生产率年平均增长4.5%。

sentences.en: The increase in pay costs was more than offset by higher productivity.
sentences.cn: 提高的生产率抵消了增加的工资成本后仍有结余。

sentences.en: The obverse of rising unemployment is continued gains in productivity.
sentences.cn: 失业率上升，相对应的是生产率进一步提高。

sentences.en: The result has been a giant leap in productivity.
sentences.cn: 其结果是生产力的大幅提高。

sentences.en: The third-quarter results reflect continued improvements in productivity.
sentences.cn: 第三季度的结果表明生产率持续上升。

sentences.en: The workers try to put up productivity.
To judge from his productivity, Mozart clearly enjoyed robust good health throughout his twenties.
sentences.cn: 从创作能力来看，莫扎特20至30岁时显然精力充沛，身体健康。

sentences.en: Wages were rising faster than productivity and this was eating into profits.
sentences.cn: 工资的涨幅高过了生产率增长的速度，从而消耗了利润所得。

sentences.en: We need to increase productivity. We need to reduce unemployment. And finally, we need to make our exports competitive on world markets.
sentences.cn: 我们需要增加生产率, 减少失业率, 最后我们需要使我们的出口产品在国际市场上具有竞争力.

words.tran_cn: 能生产的；生产的，生产性的；多产的；富有成效的
制作人，制片人；生产者；发生器
产品；结果；[数] 乘积；作品
赢利性；生产率，生产能力；多产性

phrases.tran_cn: 初级生产力；第一性生产力；基础生产力；初级生产率
全要素生产率；总要素生产力

trans.tran_cn: 生产率，生产力，[经济学] 生产率，[生态学]生产率
trans.tran_en: the rate at which goods are produced, and the amount produced, especially in relation to the work, time, and money needed to produce them
